column4: yo, can anyone here recommend a good tech news site that offers daily newsletter or podcast? so far i know of CNet, ZDNet, and TechCrunch. any suggestion on whats the best?
hey, can anyone recommend a good site that gives daily tech newletters/RSS feeds. i know of CNet, ZDNet, and TechCrunch. not sure what is best, any suggestions?
hmm, i cant think of a channel that will consider than to be on topic..
